concept.title: Export to Katalon Studio and other frameworks

li.p: On the left sidebar, go to Export > Export to other frameworks.
Select a framework (e.g., Katalon Studio or Selenium 3, Java (WebDriver + TestNG)).
Select the tests you want to export.
Katalon Recorder also notifies you here if there are incompatible commands.

conbody.p: You can now import the file/project with your framework of choice.

li.p: For Java JUnit, Java TestNG and Python, the data is exported as a full project. You can open the project in the Java/Python IDE.
For other frameworks, the data is exported as a .zip file.
